Commit 0c8c82da008b3a5d3e03f2db2ca598effcefabed message: "Issue #3423: Allow local vars without any unnecessary violations from RequireThisCheck. Added UT. Fixed related UT\n(This is a retrieve from the following deleted commit: dd6ce7e940bdad5f96b83c79ce834b375d5e99b9)" is invalid
Proper commit message should adhere to the following rules:
    1) Must match one of the following patterns:
        ^Issue #\d+: .*$
        ^Pull #\d+: .*$
        ^(minor|config|infra|doc|spelling): .*$
    2) It contains only one line of text
    3) Must not end with a period, space, or tab
    4) Commit message should be less than or equal to 200 characters

The rule broken was: 2
